title: Really again? Crash
body: This keeps happening where I get to the champ select, client freezes on 0 seconds then I get a PENALTY because the client messed up. This seems to happen to me whenever I wanna play ranked. My older post got almost ignored, so here's hoping someone at Riot is reading this one.

replies.body:
When the champion select timer hits 0 and then crashes, it's most likely due to an unstable connection between your network and our game servers. Check out our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways you can improve your networks connection.

Hit me up if you've got any other questions!
